Comments_List: Really fantastic foundational course in motion design, with a nice progression of topics and skills.
This course covers concepts, skills, and techniques for graphic design in the medium of video, including some animation and film, taught through 5 main projects.

This course was extremely well designed and taught, with just the right amount of learning by example and by experience. The most difficult part about this course was the steep learning curve with regards to video programs (mostly After Effects)
I would recommend this course to students interested in graphic design and video arts.
